instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3437 no display
threads.message: Hello, got this 3437 that has a 3 time fan spin but no display. When I do a pram reset display flashes and reboots normally. Backlight is turning on it has 24v but no image appearing. Any suggestions?

threads.title: 820-3437 no display
threads.message: Same thing on external display? Tried known good display? Any chime/USB activity?

threads.title: 820-3437 no display
threads.message: I have USB activity on USB Mouse. No external display. I do have a chime. Will try another display now that works for sure.

threads.title: 820-3437 no display
threads.message: Working display is the same, Apple logo turns on but no image after chime. I also tried to boot from external drive, same.

threads.title: 820-3437 no display
threads.message: problem solved, i just had a customer coming in with the same issue. His harddrive was fried, some black IC,  shorting the 3.3v line i guess. Removed the drive and worked. I took the drive out of this one, works as well :)! So 2 macs fixed :)

threads.title: 820-3437 no display
threads.message: Hmmm interesting. Does it see a known good SSD or option boot? If so, good. If no, might still be an issue
